
### example: changing bodies  {.smaller}

<!-- \lstset{language=myasm,style=smaller} -->
 <table>
<tr><td>
```
pop %edx
mov $0x4h, %edi
mov %ebp, %esi
mov $0xC, %eax
add $0x88, %edx
mov (%edx), %ebx
mov %ebx, 0x1118(%esi,%eax,4)

```
</td><td>
```
pop %eax
mov $0x4h, %ebx
mov %ebp, %esi
mov $0xC, %edi
add $0x88, %eax
mov (%eax), %esi
mov %esi, 0x1118(%esi,%eax,4)

```
</td></tr>
</table>
 

* code above: after decryption
* <em>every instruction</em> changes
* still has good signatures 

   * with <em>alternatives</em> for each possible register selection

* but harder to write/slower to match
